The Django Book

A comprehensive guide to the Python web framework Django, covering topics from introduction and setup to advanced features and deployment. The book includes chapters on templates, databases, forms, caching, security, and more, as well as appendices on case studies and model definition reference.

Key Concepts:

  • Introduction to Django
  • Getting started with Django
  • Django template system
  • The importance of solving real-world problems
  • The origins of Django
  • Innovations in online journalism
  • Django project structure
  • directory organization
  • security best practices
